title: Notable Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - CHGG - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of Chegg Inc (Symbol: CHGG) crossed below their 200 day moving average of $36.80, changing hands as low as $35.55 per share. Chegg Inc shares are currently trading off about 4% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of CHGG shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
